revision.text:
The '''X Attack''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's Pokemon's Attack for 60 seconds. ===Description=== Double your Pokemon attack for 60 seconds! ===Acquisition=== X Attack can be purchased at the Cerulean City Shop for 3000 coins. {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} |} |} == Trivia == {{Battle items}}
